discount_msg: Your Partner for SAP EAM/PM, Automation, and Software Solutions!
home_intro_subtitle: Your Partner for Digital Transformation, Automation & Sustainable Business Development
home_intro_description: THANK KOMPANY GmbH is a Germany-based company dedicated to empowering European businesses through SAP Enterprise Asset Management, automation engineering, software development, and digital transformation.
home_focus_area: We primarily serve clients across Germany and the D-A-CH region, while also taking on international projects worldwide. With a strong network spanning Africa, Europe, and the Americas, we bring global experience and local expertise to every project we undertake.
home_focus_area_2: At THANK KOMPANY, we combine technical excellence, innovative solutions, and cross-border collaboration to help businesses achieve measurable results and sustainable growth.
home_sap_eam_title: SAP EAM/PM Consulting: Delivering digital and smart maintenance solutions with SAP S/4HANA for peak performance
home_sap_eam_expertise_description: As an experienced SAP EAM/PM partner, we assist companies in digitizing and optimizing their maintenance processes.
home_sap_eam_expertise_1: Implementation & optimization of SAP ECC & SAP S/4HANA
home_sap_eam_expertise_2: Consulting & implementation of SAP PM/CS, SAP MRS, and mobile solutions
home_sap_eam_expertise_4: Integration with FI/CO, MM, WM/EWM, PP, CS, RS
home_automation_title: Automation Engineering: Delivering expertise in PLC programming, control systems, and automation solutions.
home_automation_expertise_description: As an experienced automation partner, we help companies develop, integrate, and optimize advanced control systems.
home_automation_expertise_2: Heating systems, tram technology & high-bay warehouse logistics
home_automation_expertise_5: Interfaces: MQTT, OPC-UA, Modbus, Profinet, Profibus
home_software_dev_title: Software Development: Delivering modern, scalable, and secure software solutions for digital transformation.
home_software_dev_expertise_description: As an experienced software development partner, we help companies build, integrate, and optimize modern digital solutions.
home_software_dev_expertise_1: Backend development: Java, Spring Boot, .NET Core, Node.js, Python, Go
home_software_dev_expertise_3: Mobile: Flutter, React Native, Kotlin, Swift
home_software_dev_expertise_4: Cloud & DevOps: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD
home_software_dev_expertise_5: API & integration solutions: REST, GraphQL, microservices
home_software_dev_expertise_6: Data engineering: SQL/NoSQL, Elasticsearch, data pipelines
home_software_dev_backend: Backend: Java, Spring Boot, .NET Core, Node.js, Python, Go
home_software_dev_mobile: Mobile: Flutter, React Native, Kotlin, Swift
home_software_dev_cloud_devops: Cloud & DevOps: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD
home_mission_description: Our mission is to deliver high-quality, intelligent digital solutions across smart maintenance, automation engineering, and software development. We are committed to combining technical excellence, innovation, and customer-focused delivery to help organizations streamline operations, enhance performance, and achieve measurable, sustainable results.
home_vision_description: Our vision is to enable organizations to operate with greater intelligence, efficiency, and reliability by uniting smart maintenance, advanced automation, and modern software engineering. We strive to deliver integrated digital solutions that strengthen performance, support sustainable growth, and position our clients for long-term success in an increasingly dynamic and technology-driven world.
home_guarantee_description: We guarantee reliable, high-quality, and future-ready solutions across all our services. Our commitment is to deliver every project with precision, transparency, and measurable value. We ensure our clients receive solutions that perform, scale, and stand the test of time.
home_results_description: We deliver measurable impact, combining technical excellence with consistent, high-quality execution. Our results reflect the trust of our clients, the reliability of our solutions, and the strength of our engineering expertise.
home_contact_form_subtitle: A question? A message for us?
sap_eam_slogan: Optimizing Maintenance. Enabling Reliability. Powering Digital Operations.
sap_eam_sap_title: Empower Your Maintenance with SAP Excellence
sap_eam_sap_description: As a leading SAP EAM/PM partner, we help asset-intensive businesses transform maintenance into a strategic advantage. From SAP ECC to SAP S/4HANA, Smart Maintenance, and mobile solutions, we deliver innovation that drives efficiency, reduces downtime, and unlocks data-driven insights. Future-proof your asset management with our expertise and elevate your operations to the next level..
sap_eam_expertise_description: We deliver comprehensive SAP EAM/PM expertise that elevates maintenance operations through scalable, integrated, and future-ready solutions.
sap_eam_expertise_service_1: Implementation & optimization of SAP ECC & SAP S/4HANA
sap_eam_expertise_service_2: Consulting & implementation of SAP EAM/PM, SAP MRS, RS & mobile maintenance solutions
sap_eam_expertise_service_3: Mobile Maintenance with SAP Service and Asset Manager
sap_eam_expertise_service_8: Integration with SAP FI/CO, MM, WM, EWM, PP
sap_eam_why_description: SAP S/4HANA sets a new standard for maintenance excellence. With intuitive Fiori interfaces, mobile-ready design, and streamlined EAM processes, maintenance teams work faster, smarter, and with fewer system barriers.
sap_eam_why_service_1: Significantly improved usability and responsive navigation
sap_eam_why_service_2: Mobile-ready maintenance applications powered by Fiori & SAP Service and Asset Manager
sap_eam_why_service_3: Real-time data processing through the in-memory HANA platform
sap_eam_why_service_4: Access to advanced technologies such as BNAC, APM, and AI-based maintenance intelligence
sap_eam_why_service_5: Continuous functional enhancements, including expanded Fiori apps, improved notification handling, and facturable maintenance
sap_eam_why_conclusion: Running S/4HANA in the cloud further enhances performance through automatic updates, reduced infrastructure management, and seamless access to the latest innovations. This allows companies to focus on reliability, not system maintenance.
sap_eam_solution_title: Solving Your Key S/4HANA EAM Challenges
sap_eam_solution_description: Transitioning maintenance processes to S/4HANA introduces operational, organizational, and technical complexity. We ensure control, visibility, and alignment throughout the journey.
sap_eam_solution_service_1: Project management: structured planning, control & execution
sap_eam_solution_service_2: Change management: user adoption & communication strategies
sap_eam_solution_service_5: Quality assurance: stable, tested, validated EAM environments
sap_eam_solution_conclusion: With years of multi-industry experience, we help companies migrate smoothly, adopt new processes confidently, and secure long-term operational value.
sap_eam_guarantee_description: We ensure every project delivers measurable operational improvements, supported by transparent communication, proven methods, and uncompromising quality.
sap_eam_guarantee_service_2: Future-proof architectures aligned with EAM best practices
sap_eam_guarantee_service_5: Solutions that reduce downtime and improve asset performance
sap_eam_maintenance_quote: ‚ÄúMaintenance is the key to the proper functioning of your business‚Äù
automation_automation_description: As an experienced automation and control engineering partner, We help industrial clients, system integrators, and building owners across Europe design, integrate, and optimize modern automation and control systems. Our solutions combine engineering excellence with cutting-edge technologies to create efficient, scalable, and intelligent environments.
automation_expertise_description: We deliver automation solutions built on robust standards and modern technologies.
automation_expertise_service_1: KNX Building Automation: Lighting, HVAC, shutters, sensors, room comfort, and energy management.
automation_expertise_service_2: Industrial Automation & Control Engineering: Functional logic design and advanced automation concepts.
automation_expertise_service_3: System Integration: Seamless connectivity with DALI, Modbus, BACnet, MQTT, OPC-UA, Profinet, Profibus, and REST.
automation_expertise_service_4: Commissioning & Optimization: Reliable, long-term performance and stability.
automation_expertise_service_5: IoT Connectivity & Digital Building Solutions: Edge devices, gateways, and cloud-ready integrations for smart buildings.
automation_expertise_service_6: Expertise across major platforms: Siemens, ABB, SEW, Sigmatek
automation_expertise_service_conclusion: We build automation environments that are flexible, energy-efficient, and ready for future operational needs.
automation_why_description: F√ºr us Intelligent automation is no longer optional but it‚Äôs a strategic advantage.
automation_why_service_1: Higher energy efficiency through sensor-driven automation
automation_why_service_4: Integration of heterogeneous technologies into one cohesive system
automation_why_service_5: Reduced maintenance effort and fewer failures thanks to digital diagnostics
automation_why_service_6: Future-proofing with IoT and smart building readiness
automation_why_conclusion: Modern buildings and industrial sites rely on intelligent automation to reduce energy consumption, increase comfort, and streamline operations.
automation_solution_description: Automation projects often face complexity and fragmentation. We simplify and standardize:
automation_solution_service_2: KNX installations without documentation or clear structure
automation_solution_service_4: Energy inefficiencies caused by poor system coordination
automation_solution_service_5: Lack of monitoring, visualisation, or remote access
automation_solution_service_6: Migration challenges when modernizing legacy automation systems
automation_solution_conclusion: Our role is to streamline complexity, standardize architecture, and deliver systems that work reliably for years.
automation_guarantee_description: We ensure every project delivers measurable operational improvements, supported by transparent communication, proven methods, and uncompromising quality.
automation_guarantee_service_1: Clean engineering and transparent system architecture
automation_guarantee_service_3: Vendor-neutral solutions that reflect your real needs
automation_maintenance_quote: ‚ÄúOur commitment: automation systems that are stable, scalable, and built with engineering excellence.‚Äù
software_dev_sd_description: As an experienced software development partner, we help organizations design, build, and scale modern digital solutions. With deep expertise in backend, frontend, mobile, cloud, DevOps, and data engineering, we guide companies toward secure, high-performance, and future-ready software ecosystems that accelerate innovation and business value.
software_dev_expertise_description: We deliver modern, scalable, and integrated software solutions built with industry-leading technologies and aligned with long-term digital strategies.
software_dev_expertise_service_1: Backend Development: Java, Spring Boot, .NET Core, Node.js, Python, and Go for robust, secure, and high-performance server architectures.
software_dev_expertise_service_2: Frontend Development: React, Angular, Vue.js, and TypeScript to build fast, intuitive, and enterprise-grade web interfaces.
software_dev_expertise_service_3: Mobile  Application Development: Flutter, React Native, Kotlin, and Swift for responsive, cross-platform mobile experiences.
software_dev_expertise_service_4: Cloud & DevOps Enablement: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines for scalable infrastructure and automated delivery.
software_dev_expertise_service_5: API & System Integration: REST, GraphQL, SOAP, and microservices architectures for seamless cross-system communication.
software_dev_expertise_service_6: Data Engineering & Search Technologies: SQL/NoSQL databases, Elasticsearch, and modern data pipelines to support analytics, automation, and intelligent business decisions.
software_dev_why_description: Modern organizations rely on flexible, scalable, and secure software to compete in fast-moving digital environments. With modular architectures, cloud-native platforms, and modern development frameworks, companies can innovate faster, operate more efficiently, and adapt rapidly to market changes.
software_dev_why_service_1: Faster development cycles with modern frameworks and CI/CD
software_dev_why_service_2: Scalable architectures prepared for business growth
software_dev_why_service_3: Secure and compliant systems aligned with industry standards
software_dev_why_conclusion: Continuous advancements in cloud computing, AI-assisted development, container orchestration, and automation provide even greater optimization potential and empowering companies to build smarter, faster, and more resilient applications.
software_dev_solution_title: How We Master Your Software Modernization
software_dev_solution_description: Modernizing development practices, rebuilding legacy systems, and scaling digital products can be complex. We make it simple, structured, and future-ready.
software_dev_solution_service_1: Project Management: Agile frameworks, transparent workflows, and automated delivery pipelines
software_dev_solution_service_2: Change Management: Seamless user onboarding, integrated training platforms, and process automation
software_dev_solution_service_3: Architecture Redesign: Microservices-based, API-first systems with cloud-native scalability
software_dev_solution_service_4: Budget Clarity: Predictable cost models and transparent resource allocation
software_dev_solution_service_5: Quality Assurance: Continuous integration, automated testing suites, and validated release cycles
software_dev_solution_conclusion: We harness advancements in cloud computing, AI-assisted development, container orchestration, and automation to help you build smarter, faster, and more resilient applications.
software_dev_guarantee_description: We engineer software that is secure, scalable, and built for measurable business impact‚Äîpowered by transparent communication, proven engineering practices, and uncompromising quality.
software_dev_guarantee_service_1: Reliable Delivery: Clearly defined milestones and predictable outcomes
software_dev_guarantee_service_2: Future-Proof Architecture: Cloud-native, API-driven, and aligned with industry best practices
software_dev_guarantee_service_3: Business-Centric Design: Solutions that drive real, measurable results
software_dev_guarantee_service_4: Transparent Collaboration: Full visibility and alignment at every stage
software_dev_maintenance_quote: ‚ÄúWe transform complexity into opportunity, delivering future-ready software that drives growth and innovation.‚Äù‚Äù

contact.description: Have a question or a project in mind? We'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form below or use our contact details to reach us.

footer_slogan_description: Delivering smart maintenance, advanced automation, and intelligent software solutions that elevate businesses and drive measurable growth.
